name: Greek Lemon Thyme Potatoes
description: [Photographs: Carrie Vasios] Check out other recipes from Serious Entertaining: Greek Easter »...
recipeIngredient: 2 pounds mixed baby red and fingerling potatoes, scrubbed, larger ones cut in half

recipeInstructions.text: In a large baking pan, toss potatoes with olive oil, lemon juice, and thyme. Season with ample salt and pepper. Roast until potatoes are crisp and the lemon juice has caramelized, about 45 minutes
